</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Compares types of all elements of an array to the type of a single value.
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> arr '''isEqualTypeAll''' val </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> arr: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> val: [[Anything]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0];
_arr [[isEqualTypeAll]] ""; //false
_arr [[isEqualTypeAll]] 0; //true</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[isEqualTypeArray]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeParams]], [[param]], [[params]], [[isEqualTo]], [[typeName]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command will return false if the array on the left side is empty ([]) regardless of the sample value.<br>
<code>[] isEqualTypeAll ""
-> false
</code><br>
</dd>
